name: Basket Up
description:
Tap to go up and drop the ball into the basket target.
Aim for the target -- win!

Enjoy the best experience with Basket Up. It will remind you 1 of the best game, you might have played the most in the childhood. Prepare to experience the joy of playing best basketball game with real feel.

NOW WITH WORLD LEADERBOARDS, AND YOU CAN CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS ONLINE TO A MATCH BY TAPPING ON THE LEADERBOARD BUTTON AND THEN THE CHALLENGE BUTTON.

The game play for the basket up is very additive for people to play and it's easy to navigate upward.

If you have enjoyed the game, please do share the game with your friends and family.

Thank you very much for playing Basket Up!
